topic.title: PK's Bar and Grill
topic.shortdesc: The ranch at PK's Bar and Grill is exceptional. Extremely close if not identical to Ken's Buttermilk.

body.p: PK's Bar and Grill easily has the best ranch in Blacksburg. There is a perfect amount of dill & tang in the flavor and a great consistency - not too thick and not too runny. My only complaint about this ranch is that it comes in an extremely small side dipping container. I need more!!

fig.title: PK's Bar & Grill: Home of the most fantastic ranch in Blacksburg

image.alt: Image of the outside of PK's Bar & Grill

body.p: Despite the portion size not meeting my liking, this ranch wins by a landslide when compared to the other ranches offered in Blacksburg. PK's ranch is nowhere near Hidden Valley Easy Squeeze, it's in a league of its own. Move over, Ken's Buttermilk, there's a new ranch in town.
